articles.title: National Meeting Marks 76th Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 76th Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Thursday to celebrate the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending it were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly; Choe Ryong Hae, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK; Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK; and officials of the Party and government and armed forces organs.
					
					 Present were members of the party central leadership organ, officials of the Party Central Committee, armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, teachers and students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School, officials of institutions and industrial establishments, those who had the honor of being received by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, labor innovators and working people in Pyongyang and congratulatory groups and delegations of overseas compatriots including a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan and other compatriots.
					
					 Present on invitation were representatives of foreign embassies and international organizations, military attaches and other foreign guests here.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter said that the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il was an ardent life of a peerless patriot who laid a solid foundation for the building of a socialist power through total dedication with his plan and desire to glorify the country of Juche all over the world.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a gifted thinker and theoretician who provided the undying ideological and theoretical treasure for prosperity of Juche Korea with his distinguished wisdom and unusual pursuit, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 He is an outstanding statesman who provided the powerful political force for carrying forward the cause of building a powerful socialist country and a peerlessly illustrious commander who provided the powerful military guarantee for victoriously advancing the building of a thriving country.
					
					 He is the genius of creation and construction as he laid a strong springboard from which to make our country leap toward an economic power and a highly civilized country.
					
					 He advanced the patriotic line and policies for independent reunification and paved a wide avenue for building a reunified country, dignified and prosperous, and made great contributions to strengthening the world socialist movement and realizing the cause of independence against imperialism through his outstanding diplomatic savvy and energetic external activities.
					
					 With his noble responsibilities for the future of the country and the revolution, he gave a perfect solution to the issue of succession to the leadership. This is the greatest patriotic feat that provided a sure guarantee for the eternal future of Juche Korea and its ever-lasting victory.
					
					 The noble revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il, who laid an eternal cornerstone for guaranteeing the prosperity of the country and the happiness of posterity and opened up the bright prospect of Juche Korea, will shine long for all ages, the reporter stressed.
					
					 Meanwhile, similar meetings took place in provinces, cities, counties and industrial complexes on the same day.

articles.title: Statement by Director of Press, Institute for American Studies of DPRK FM
articles.content:
Statement by Director of Press, Institute for American Studies of DPRK FM
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The director of the press of the Institute for American Studies of the DPRK Foreign Ministry made public the following statement on Thursday:
					 The United States is again kicking up a defamation campaign against the DPRK, intentionally attributing Warmbier's death to the latter.
					
					 Obviously, Warmbier is a criminal who was sentenced to reform through labor on March 16, 2016 under the relevant DPRK law on a charge of anti-DPRK hostile acts committed under an instruction from U.S. agency engaged in anti-DPRK plot. 
					
					 It is none other than the present U.S. administration that has an answer to the reason why Warmbier suddenly died less than one week after his return to U.S. in normal physical condition.
					
					 In this regard, it is worth reminding of one incident that Hunziker, an American citizen who illegally entered the DPRK territory on August 24, 1996 and returned home on November 27 same year in good health, thanks to our humanitarian measure, accompanied by Bill Richardson, the then U.S. House representative, died less than one month after his return. At that time, U.S. completely ignored and mentioned no word at all of his death.
					
					 Though Warmbier was a criminal who committed hostile acts against the DPRK, we took the measure, pursuant to the decision of the Central Court dated June 13, 2017, of allowing him to return home from humanitarian point of view, in consideration of repeated requests from the current U.S. administration and his bad health.
					
					 Nonetheless, Trump group is kicking up a fuss of denunciation against the DPRK, intentionally linking Warmbier's death to the latter. It is a manifestation of crafty intention aimed at making justification for tarnishing our international image, stirring up an international pressure and vindicating its attempt to stifle us by force, as Trump group is terrified at the strength of the DPRK that has made a dignified rise to the status of strategic state.  
					
					 It is not accidental that there is an assessment coming from U.S. that the present administration's increased move of taking up the DPRK's "human rights" issue amounts to an attempt for "regime change".
					
					 Trump group is even resorting to ridiculous action of dragging those human scum, who committed crimes of treason against the nation and fled to south Korea, into anti-DPRK plot. But, it only highlights how much U.S. fears the DPRK.
					
					 The disgraceful moves of Trump group teach us that any humanitarian approach or leniency towards U.S. is a total taboo, and our determination grows stronger to further sharpen the blade of law.
					
					 U.S. would be well advised to mind its own miserable human rights record full of all social disturbances and bloody tragic events caused by Trump's unbridled remarks of advocating for white supremacy and racism, which are subject to international curse and denunciation. 
					
					 U.S. should demonstrate prudence and self-restraint, bearing in mind that it shall pay a high price for all consequences to follow in case it continues to stick to anti-DPRK plot, groundlessly pointing a finger at the alleged DPRK's "human rights" issue.

articles.title: Joint Taekwon-Do Demonstration Performances of North and South of Korea Held in Seoul
articles.content:
Joint Taekwon-Do Demonstration Performances of North and South of Korea Held in Seoul
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Taekwon-Doists of the north and the south of Korea gave joint demonstration performances in Seoul on Monday and Wednesday.
					 Watching the performances were the speaker of the National Assembly, the representative of the Minju Party, the mayor of Seoul City and other personages of political, social, media, business and religious circles of south Korea, those concerned with Taekwon-Do and Seoul citizens.
					
					 Taekwon-Doists of the north and the south mesmerized the spectators through the joint demonstration performance in Sokcho of south Korea and they represented impressive scenes in the performances in Seoul, too.
					
					 Members of the DPRK Taekwon-Do demonstration group conducted the team and quintet patterns with dynamic and orderly rhythms and knocked out their opponents with swift actions and strong strikes in self-defense art, winning the admiration of the spectators. 
					
					 Whenever they perfectly performed diverse, powerful and special actions and general destroying actions, giving fullest play to their mental and physical strength, the spectators broke into warm applauses.
					
					 Taekwon-Doists of the south side also displayed unique martial art technique and skills.
					
					 The joint demonstration performances given by the Taekwon-Doists of the north and the south together deeply impressed the spectators.
					
					 At the end of the demonstration performances, personages of various strata of south Korea mounted the stage to congratulate the Taekwon-Doists of the north and the south, and spectators did not leave their seats for a long time, waving their hands.
					
					 The joint demonstration performances with the 23rd Winter Olympics as a momentum fully displayed the wisdom and strong spirit of the Korean nation and development of Taekwon-Do technique.

articles.title: Greetings to Serbian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Serbian President 
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a congratulatory message to Aleksandar Vucic, president of Serbia, Thursday on its national day.
					 Extending congratulations to the president and the people of Serbia, Kim Yong Nam in the message expressed the conviction that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in line with the desire and wish of their peoples.

articles.title: Greetings to Serbian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Serbian PM
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Serbian Prime Minster Ana Branibic on the occasion of the national day of Serbia.
					 The message wished Ana Branibic and the Serbian government bigger success in their work for the country's development and the people's wellbeing, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in their common interests.
					
					 On the same day, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a similar message to Ivica Dacic, first deputy prime minister and foreign minister of Serbia.

articles.title: Demonstration Performance of Synchronized Swimming Marks Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Demonstration Performance of Synchronized Swimming Marks Day of Shining Star 
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A demonstration performance of synchronized swimming for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il "Eternal February Song" was given at the swimming pool of the Changgwang Health Complex Thursday.
					 Enjoying it were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee, and Jon Kwang Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials concerned and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 The event began with group synchronized swimming "We Present Bouquets".
					
					 The performers showed the deep reverence of the army and people for Kim Jong Il in several numbers.
					
					 They made wonderful depiction of the indomitable mental power and revolutionary stamina of the Korean army and people winning fresh victory and working miracles on all fronts of building a powerful socialist nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Stamps Issued to Mark 76th Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Stamps Issued to Mark 76th Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea produced new stamps (one sheet and one individual) in celebration of the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Seen on the upper part of the stamps were letters reading "Celebration of 76th Birth Anniversary of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il" and "Juche 31(1942)-Juche 107 (2018)".
					
					 A sheet depicting the statue of Kim Jong Il in Samjiyon County helps recall the brilliant revolutionary career and feats of the peerless patriot who provided the eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and happiness of posterity to realize his noblest patriotic desire for building a powerful country all his life.
					
					 A stamp portrays Jong Il Peak towering high reflective of the spirit of February and Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp, mental mainstay of the Korean army and people.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Kimjongilia Festival Venue
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Kimjongilia Festival Venue
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here Thursday visited the venue of the 22nd Kimjongilia Festival ahead of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Military attaches looked round the venue full of flowers in praise and reverence for the great man which have come into full bloom with sincerity of the Korean people and the world progressives following Kim Jong Il as the eternal sun.
					
					 Earlier, they toured the Pyongyang Sports Goods Factory and the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory.

articles.title: Nepali Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Nepali Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the United Socialist Nationalist Party of Nepal led by Chairman of its Central Committee Kamal Prasad Chaulagain visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the native home in Mangyongdae, the guests looked round historic relics, being briefed on the exploits of the President.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Korean Revolution Museum, the Party Founding Museum, the Sci-tech Complex, etc.

articles.title: New Non-electric Water Pump Developed
articles.content:
New Non-electric Water Pump Developed
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A new non-electric water pump draws attention of agricultural communities in the DPRK.
					 As it is powered by the natural flow of water, it is of great practical utility in not only lowlands but also mountainous areas.
					
					 It is simple in structure and manufacture and has proved highly efficient in irrigating croplands.
					
					 It was developed by a research group of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il from Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Muhammadu Buhari, president and commander－in－chief of the Armed Forces of the Federal Republic of Nigeria sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					 The floral basket was laid before the statues Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from South African Party Leader
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from South African Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Blade Nzimande, general secretary of the South African Communist Party, Thursday on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were sent to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star by foreign organizations and figures.
					 They included the Switzerland-Korea Committee, the Yuwen Middle School in Jilin of China, Jindallae Saphariny, president of the Jindallae Children's Foundation, and figures of Angola and Equatorial Guinea.
					
					 The floral baskets were laid at the statues Thursday.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Show Will to Defend Tok Islets
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Show Will to Defend Tok Islets
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the 23rd Winter Olympics opened in Phyongchang of south Korea.
					 The sportspersons from the north and the south marched past amid the playing of song "Arirang," led by the Korean Peninsula flag.
					
					 There was not Tok Islets marked on the flag, though.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Thursday says that we already demanded the International Olympic Committee mark the islets on the Korean Peninsula flag to be used by the north and south of Korea at the Winter Olympics.
					
					 However the IOC made a wrong decision to use the flag without the islets for the reason that "it is unsuitable to connect the political matter to sports", the commentary says.
					
					 Querying how the marking of the Tok Islets can be a "political matter", the commentary notes:
					
					 The IOC turned down our principled request, talking about "political matter". It is an unreasonable act of abetting the ambition of the Japanese reactionaries to grab the Tok Islets and making the issue of the islets an international and political one.
					
					 Such unreasonable decision eloquently shows that the Japanese reactionaries are behind it.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should draw a serious lesson from the recent incident. The issue of the Korean Peninsula flag is not a mere marking of the islets but it is an important matter to preserve the claim to the territory.
					
					 They should show the will to defend the islets in practice in the face of outsider's interference and pressure rather than claiming that the islets belong to the territory of Korea.
					
					 The islets will be part of the territory of the Korean nation in the future, too, as in the past.

articles.title: S. Korea: Conservatives Hit for Attempting to Spoil Climate of National Concord
articles.content:
S. Korea: Conservatives Hit for Attempting to Spoil Climate of National Concord
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Progressive Federation of Students of south Korea on Feb. 13 held press conferences outside the buildings of the "Liberal Korea Party" and the "Parunmirae Party" in Seoul, urging the conservative political parties to stop any attempt to spoil the atmosphere for improved north-south relations created with the Winter Olympics as an occasion, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The organization stressed that the people hope for dialogue and reconciliation with the north, not confrontation.
					
					 At the end of the press conferences it thrust letters of protest to the two traitorous parties.

articles.title: Works of Peerlessly Great Men Studied Abroad
articles.content:
Works of Peerlessly Great Men Studied Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Seminars and reading sessions on works of the peerlessly great men took place in Russia, Switzerland, Austria, Hungary, Ethiopia and Angola between Jan. 16 and Feb. 3 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The works included "With the Century", "Socialism Is a Science" and "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party".
					
					 The chief of the Moscow Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Russia said that Kim Jong Il made public a lot of works giving perfect answers to all matters arising in the revolution and construction and that his works are run through with the Juche idea.
					
					 The DPRK could overcome all difficulties and trials and defend socialism at the end of the last century, the harshest time, as it consistently adhered to the requirements of the Juche idea in the revolution and construction, the chief said, stressing the need to study the Juche idea and apply it in practice.
					
					 The chief of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said the great Juche idea serves as the beacon brightly illuminating the road ahead of the progressives century after century and that the exploits of Kim Jong Il, who developed in depth the Juche idea into the guiding idea in the era of independence, would shine long.
					
					 The chief of the Youth Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism formed in Austria and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il as a genius of ideology and theory.
					
					 The chairman of the Ethiopian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star lauded Kim Jong Il's immortal ideo-theoretical feats, saying that the U.S. and its followers are making desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK but the Korean people who keep the Juche idea as their faith are making more dynamic advance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Brazil
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea on Jan. 30 posted on its website the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The work, published on November 1, Juche 83 (1994), clarifies the idea that Korean-style socialism based on the socialist theory of Juche is the most scientific and vital one. And it expounds the principled matters arising in defending socialism.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central por 76o aniversario del natalicio de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central por 76o aniversario del natalicio de Kim Jong Il 
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto central por el 76o aniversario del natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del BP del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y primer ministro de la RPDC, los cuadros del Partido y el gobierno y los funcionarios responsables de los organos de fuerzas armadas.
					
					Tambien, participaron los miembros de los organos de direccion central del partido en esta capital, los funcionarios del CC del PTC y las instituciones de las fuerzas armadas, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los profesores, los empleados y los matriculados de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae y de la Escuela Revolucionaria Kang Pan Sok, los funcionarios de la instituciones, las fabricas y las empresas de esta capital, los hombres entrevistados con el Dirigente, los innovadores laborales, los trabajadores, los integrantes de los grupos de felicitacion y las delegaciones de compatriotas residentes en ultramar, incluso el grupo de coreanos residentes en Japon y los compatriotas que permanecen en la patria.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Ryong Hae.
					
					El orador dijo que la vida revolucionaria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue la de patriota sin igual quien con su gran proposito de glorificar la patria del Juche a la vista de todo el mundo, sento la solida base de construccion de una potencia socialista dedicando todo lo suyo. 
					
					Haciendo uso de su extraordinaria prevision e comparable facultad de estudio, el Dirigente, genial ideologo y teorico, preparo los imperecederos patrimonios ideo-teoricos para la prosperidad de la Corea del Juche, apunto.
					
					Recordo que el politico destacado y General Insigne formo una poderosa fuerza politica capaz de encargarse de la causa de construccion de un Estado socialista poderoso y dio la garantia militar de la edificacion de una patria prospera. 
					
					Elogio al Dirigente como gran maestro de creacion y construccion quien hizo solida la plataforma de salto que permite a nuestra patria convertirse en potencia economica y civilizada. 
					
					Al presentar la linea y orientaciones patrioticas sobre la reunificacion independiente de la patria, abrio la avenida de construccion de una digna potencia reunificada y prospera e hizo gran aporte al desarrollo del movimiento socialista mundial y al cumplimiento de la causa de independencia antiimperialista con su extraordinaria estratagema diplomatica y energicas actividades exteriores, recalco.
					
					Resolvio perfectamente el problema de sucesion de la direccion con la noble responsabilidad del futuro de la patria y la revolucion y con esta proeza patriotica mas grande, aseguro el futuro maravilloso y la victoria eterna de la Corea del Juche, senalo.
					
					Seran eternas la noble vida y hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, concluyo. 
					
					Este dia, tuvieron lugar actos similares en todas las provincias, ciudades, distritos y complejos industriales.

articles.title: Tiene lugar en Seul la demostracion conjunta Norte-Sur de Taekwondo
articles.content:
Tiene lugar en Seul la demostracion conjunta Norte-Sur de Taekwondo 
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 12 y 14 en Seul la demostracion conjunta de los taekwondocas de ambas partes coreanas.
					Entre el publico se distinguian el presidente de la Asamblea Nacional, la representante del Partido Minju, el alcalde de Seul y otras personalidades de los circulos politico, social, empresarial y religioso y de prensa del Sur de Corea asi como los hombres relacionados con Taekwondo de ambas partes coreanas y los ciudadanos de Seul.
					
					Los ejecutantes, que habian dejado fascinados a los espectadores durante su estreno en Sokcho del Sur de Corea, escenificaron tambien en Seul las imagenes espectaculares.
					
					Los taekwondocas norcoreanos cumplieron con ritmo vigoroso y disciplinado el pattern colectivo y el de 5 personas.
					
					Causaron la admiracion del publico los agiles movimientos y golpes duros con que ellos doblegaron a todos los rivales en la modalidad de defensa personal.
					
					Estallaron fuertes aplausos cada vez que se cumplian perfectamente las habilidades y las acciones de power poniendo en pleno juego la fuerza mental y fisica.
					
					Los ejecutantes surcoreanos tambien mostraron peculiares movimientos tecnicos y modos del arte marcial ortodoxo.
					
					La demostracion dejo profunda impresion al publico.
					
					Cuando ella concluyo, las personalidades surcoreanas de diferentes sectores felicitaron en la escena a los ejecutantes y los espectadores lo hicieron agitandoles la mano.
					
					La demostracion conjunta N-S, efectuada en ocasion de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales, devino una oportunidad magnifica para mostrar la inteligencia y el impetu indoblegable de la nacion coreana y la avanzada tecnica de Taekwondo.

articles.title: Efectuada la presentacion modelo de natacion sincronica por el 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Efectuada la presentacion modelo de natacion sincronica por el 16 de febrero
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en la Piscina del Complejo de Servicios de Higiene Changgwang la presentacion modelo de natacion sincronica "Cancion eterna de febrero" en homenaje al Dia de la Estrella Luz, natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Entre el publico se distinguian Choe Hwi, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, el vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho, los funcionarios de las ramas interesadas, los trabajadores, los jovenes y los estudiantes de esta capital. 
					
					La demostracion quedo iniciada con la natacion sincronica colectiva "Dedicamos los ramos de flores".
					
					Las ejecutantes mostraron en sus piezas que todos los militares y habitantes veneran mucho al Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Describieron bien la indoblegable fuerza espiritual y el impetu revolucionario del pueblo coreano que bajo la guia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea alcanza las victorias y milagros  nuevos en todos los campos de gran auge.

articles.title: Emitidos sellos dedicados al Dia de Estrella Luz
articles.content:
Emitidos sellos dedicados al Dia de Estrella Luz
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 76 de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la Direccion Estatal de Sellos de Corea dio a luz nuevos sellos (un papel enterizo de pequeno tamano y un sello individual).
					  En la parte superior de ellos se leen las letras "En conmemoracion del aniversario 76 de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il" y "El 31 (1942) de la Era Juche - El 107 (2018) de la Era Juche".
					
					  En el papel enterizo esta dibujada la estatua de bronce del Dirigente levantada en el distrito de Samjiyon.
					
					Hace recordar la vida y hazanas revolucionarias del patriota sin par quien preparo la piedra angular de la prosperidad del pais y la felicitad de todas las generaciones venideras trabajando en toda su vida con el noble deseo de convertir el pais en una potencia.
					
					  El sello individual contiene el dibujo del pico Jong Il levantado con el vigor y espiritu de febrero y de la casa natal del Dirigente en el Campamento Secreto del monte Paektu, pilar espiritual de los militares y habitantes coreanos.
